name: Kilos Point Intermission 01: killing Time
description:
Sabrina's looking to kill some time in between rounds and catch a break from her annoying co-competitor.

Intermission between @ColorsOfDoom and @madds_lion  for Kilos Point OCT. 

If for some reason your found this page for reasons unrelated to the OCT, this VN might not make much sense, I recommend going over the twitter page for more context.
